name: XNode
summary: PHP 5.3+ server and client implementation of XHTTP
short_description: The XNode framework is a PHP 5.3+ implementation of the Extended Hypertext Transfer Protocol (http://www.xhttp.org), with simple service integration, full arguments support including Base64 and DateTime, single and multiple asynchronous requests, data streaming, remote API creation from XHTTP service schemas, and a runtime plugin architecture.
